titles: A true relation of the taking of Bristoll containing the several circumstances thereof as it was sent in a letter by an eye-witnesse to the Governor at Oxford, Iuly 30. Together with his Excellencies propositions to both Houses of Parliament, August the 1.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
